original_text: “‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: In the first month on the first day you are to take a young bull without defect and purify the sanctuary.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 첫째 달 초하룻날에 흠 없는 수송아지 한 마리를 가져다가 성소를 정결하게 하되

sentences.original_text: 'This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
In the first month on the first day
you are to take a young bull without defect
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 흠 없는 어린 수소를 가져야 하며
